p: The cytokine storm leads to acute cardiac injury, acute respiratory distress syndrome, and infection, leading to generalized sepsis and multisystem failure, which may lead to death ( 11, 12). Thus, preventing the cytokine storm may be key for the treatment of COVID-19 infected patients. Since there is a lack of effective therapies and immunological treatments may be insufficient, melatonin, owing to its multiple actions as summarized by Zhang et al. ( 8), may have beneficial effects in preventing or attenuating the cytokine storm and reducing morbidity and mortality from this disease.
